Evironmental_Safeguard.Reason: The study showed that project does not harm forest wildlife habitat, cultural site, used water source and local health in the area
Evironmental_Safeguard.Submissiondate: 28-Aug-2009 (Date Environmental Analysis Report and Environmental Management Plan sent to Safeguard Working Group (SWG) of NCDDs)

Land_Safeguard.Reason: The concerned families voluntarily grant their parts of lands (lesser than 5%) and properties on the lands to the project

Highland_Safeguard.Reason: These villages are not in the watched list of HP
